Name: Coffeeshop The Saint

Name: Coffeeshop The Saint
Review Text: Nicely tucked away, staff were really friendly and chatty, nice place to chill and smoke

Name: Coffeeshop The Saint
Review Text: Warm and inviting little coffee shop found down the side street. The drinks were reasonably priced and the weed smoked a treat. It was a cold day and it was lovely and toasty on the inside. Just what you need!

Name: Coffeeshop The Saint
Review Text: Lady that served us was friendly, milkshakes are awesome. Lovely little coffee shop that we stumbled across by accident but were glad we did.

Name: Coffeeshop The Saint
Review Text: Awesome coffeeshop very relaxed atmosphere, the lady that works there is super friendly and full of information, we stopped back here several times during our trip üëçüëçüëç

Name: Coffeeshop The Saint
Review Text: Friendly and helpful staff, great coffee and juice. Location good. Worth a visit if your in the area and fancy a drink.

Name: Coffeeshop The Saint
Review Text: It was my first trip to Amsterdam and the Saint was my first coffeshop. Staff was very chill, nice music, wide choice of weed. Clearly recommendable for taking a lil drink and smoking big joint.

Name: Coffeeshop The Saint
Review Text: The Staff was very kind and the ambiente is great. A good place to sit down, smoke weed (which was awesome by the way), relax and listen to great music. I recommend this spot for everyone.

Name: Coffeeshop The Saint
Review Text: Nice place to smoke with unique reggae music!!!

Name: Coffeeshop The Saint
Review Text: Easy going staff, sweet reggae music, Ajax Amsterdam matches. All you need for recharging your batteries after a stressful day.. Oh, yeah! And they sell hash, weed, pre-rolled joints, non-alcoholic drinks and rolling eqiupment. Enjoy

Name: Coffeeshop The Saint
Review Text: Tiny place, sweet vibe. Sick lighters!

Name: Coffeeshop The Saint
Review Text: This coffeeshop is a nice small, Tucked away in a sidewalk but has good amount of outdoor seating with shelter. Inside is small L shaped room and bar. A Small nicely priced menu with good items and fresh juice! The downfall is the seating ‚Ä¶

Name: Coffeeshop The Saint
Review Text: Hard to find, easy to love. This tiny shop has more atmosphere than many of the big famous shops. Dependable quality, and pure gezellig.

Name: Coffeeshop The Saint
Review Text: My favorite coffeeshop in amsterdam. Not the best gear but the perfect alley to stay out of the hustle and bustle of the town.

Name: Coffeeshop The Saint
Review Text:

Well worth a visit! ;-)
